'''14w04b''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on January 24, 2014,<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|426744169068249088|Minecraft snapshot 14w04b has just been released to fix things that called you funny names: https://mojang.com/2014/01/minecraft-snapshot-14w04a/|24 Jan 14}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140131052758/https://mojang.com/2014/01/minecraft-snapshot-14w04a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w04b|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[14w04a]].

14w04b was reuploaded a few minutes later to fix issues with items and item frames.<ref>Replying to {{tweet|simnico971|426746133864808448|@Dinnerbone we cannot place item frames and items on the ground don’t rotate !|24 Jan 14}}: {{tweet|Dinnerbone|426746265335234560|@simnico971 Redownload it. Sorry.|24 Jan 14}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* 14w04b is the last Java Edition version in which the [[missing texture]] cannot be encountered in the vanilla game without resource packs.
* 14w04b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
